title: Curse of the Egyptian Goddess
description: Given her ten-year curse that leaves her beaten and bruised, Emma Patrix has grown accustomed to drinking away the pain. And with a trail of dead bodies behind her, it was only a matter of time before the law caught up.Now she's accused of murder and she must find the one man who can help her break the curse-Calvin Konrad. But he's not the same sweet boy she remembers.
author: Lisa Rayns
